item.title: HTB - Ophiuchi
item.description: Ophiuchi Contents Write Up Recon Credentials Notes Write Up Two ports are open, 22 and 8080. Pulling up 8080 brings up an online yaml parser page. Submitting text brings up a page with Due to security reason this feature has been temporarily on hold. We will soon fix the issue!. Putting a ' in the input and hitting submit pulls up an error page, revealing that the page is using snakeyaml.
